response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our unique product which holds significant value to me. Given its importance, I believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. Considering its true worth and the benefits it could bring to you, I am offering this product to you for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, while also allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its significance to me. I trust that this offer will be beneficial for both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
